name: Mostafa Jalal
about: Excellent knowledge on process development, time utilization, product quality, buyer demand & management. Always ready with innovative ideas to develop process, quality standard & productivity to achieve the goal. Excellent capability to reach the goal by execute the work plan within time frame.

name: Mirza Mamunur Rashid
about: Excellent knowledge on product quality, buyer demand & management. Determined to ensure product quality standard by share innovative ideas. Excellent capability to analyze buyer demand & spread out to all. Likes to share ideas to subordinate to develop their skill.
